attributes.action: avoid MPs and Aides "unnwittingly misleading the public" by bringing MPs into line with the majority of working adults in the UK, by requiring receipts and details of all expense claims made on the public purse and for these details to be made open to the public, in line with the Scottish Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All members of parliament, members aides, members relatives, employees etc to fill out claims forms, provide receipts, and prove expense claims as valid, and for the claims to be open to public scrutiny.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
